items.name: Flamebelcher
items.target: Each creature and object in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The area is covered in sticky fire until the start of the crucibite's next turn. Any creature who enters the area for the first time in a round or starts their turn there takes 2 fire damage.
The area becomes a 10 x 1 line, and if any ally of the crucibite is in the area when it is created, the ability deals an extra 2 damage to each target.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If the target has a loyalty collar, they are reduced to 0 Stamina.
When the crucibite is reduced to 0 Stamina, their loyalty collar explodes, dealing 1d6 damage to each adjacent enemy and object.
